docs.lead_paragraph: Has a corner been turned in America's heroin epidemic?

headline.main: The Heroin Epidemic; Addiction Pace Seems to Have Slowed But Methadone's Use Poses Problems

docs.abstract: NY Times analysis of US heroin epidemic maintains there is optimism among authorities that 'a once-runaway situation seems to have at least slowed in pace;' expansion of drug therapy programs cited
docs.snippet: Has a corner been turned in America's heroin epidemic?
